content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "google" command to get hyperlinks from a Wikipedia page, receiving several links. I executed "ls -la" and received a list of files, including "new_file.txt". I successfully wrote text to "new_file.txt" and read it. I attempted to replace the word "text" with "word" in "new_file.txt" but received an error that occurrence index 1 is out of range. I successfully appended more text to "new_file.txt". I used the "list_files" command and received a list of files in the directory.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: ', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "how to make a river"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=os1SA2ZpVdE", "https://picklebums.com/make-a-river/", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3rqgGM3qx1U", "https://www.esri.com/arcgis-blog/products/arcgis-pro/mapping/make-a-river-map/", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fsnOMOiR1e4", "https://mysticriver.org/new-blog-1/2020/5/13/7-make-your-own-rivernbspnbspnbspnbsp", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6fx0PEx0g5k", "https://www.pinterest.com/pin/408349891185936740/"]', type='action_result')]
"""
